documents.document: .@metlinkwgtn Great to feel looked after instead of like a pain in the arse! #safetyfirst 2/2
.@metlinkwgtn Thanks to 712 bus driver on Moxham Av bout 8.20am who waited for this slow cyclist to get to a safe place til passing. 1/2
Happened to be reading about #GoByBikeDay when this swag from @aotearoabike showed up, cheers! Feeling like a champ. https://t.co/t7uzvpN41o
When you see the Speaker of the House heading into the Briscoes sale you gotta wonder if we're paying the poor guys enough #waitangiday
WTF is with ACT's School of Practical Politics? It sounds like Hogwarts. I'm expecting candidates to be teens in witch hats. #nzpol
@nzpost Think you guys might have staffing issues. Came at 11.50 to queues out door, back at 1.30, bigger queues. https://t.co/2K2Nnx39Eq
Feeling like war reporter wearing TV flak jacket to avoid getting killed... Would prefer cycle lanes over vest. https://t.co/99ODSvvjiA
@patrickmorgan, best soundbite yet! "It's not really a story about cycling. It's just a story about someone being a dick, really.''
Thanks to @patrickmorgan for sprucing up my ride with a bit of political participation #lovecycling. https://t.co/ZePb2I6uCC
@leebeenz despite abandoning us you will still be peer reviewing my comms plan, so you just wait and see, there was coffee-fuelled progress.
When you've had so much coffee you think you might be writing gibberish but it feels awesome so you keep going. https://t.co/0zaB9uHMrF
@jandal_life Something I did before baby, about every 3 months in a fit of self loathing to no effect
@jandal_life Always thought Rudimental's Not Giving In would be quite motivational. It's basically a running playlist, right?
@jandal_life Fuck you I won't do whachu tell me, haha!
@jandal_life Excellent. The Sam and Dave a very nice touch.
@jandal_life I can't believe Push It is not on the list yet.
@metlinkwgtn No.2 to Miramar, yesterday about 4.30 at Courtenay Pl
@ctrly Definitely a few grumpy drivers, which is why I notice the lovely ones.
@metlinkwgtn ...your driver waits patiently, quips he'll add it to the bill, makes sure everyone is seated comfortably. Nice one. (2/2)
@metlinkwgtn A man on crutches, a blind woman with dog, and a mum with pram all pile onto a packed rush hour bus in Wgtn and... (1/2)
I love how honest this health star rating is. Wonder if they get half a point for putting it on the packet? #worthit https://t.co/fqmalsWEIZ
@WgtnCC Thanks for the new pedestrian crossing on Kilbirnie Cres, it's perfect - any chance of dropping speed limit to 30 too?
Just realised I have been listening to Wu Tang for the last 20m #whencouplesshareiPods
The excitement when you remember you have uneaten snacks, and the disappointment when you realise it's a chia bar. What was I thinking.
Stuff my kid just threw in her bath while I wasn't looking: a full toilet roll, a clean nappy, a bucket and a gumboot #toddlerlife
Getting a marae to do govt's work #newzealandvalues: https://t.co/gVu68KW4he
@leebeenz Yes, I think I was too quick to blame my kid, sounds like I'm not the only one who now has Candy Crush!
@klimtypefoundry @arebee Change is always bad, that's a fact.
The moment of dread when you realise yr kid's key mashing has resulted in Windows10 being installed on your laptop. https://t.co/FGLlSa2446
@EmmaMakes Me too! It took my 8 months to realise my genderless backpack was actually the best nappy bag.
My secret shame at my @SustainTrust desk... https://t.co/sQHcrzWrnr
And this is why you should apply for jobs @SustainTrust... https://t.co/ZYmw2TJfGH
Come work with meeeeee! Go on. https://t.co/CJQfFC0nki
@kirstenmairinz Yes, our Mum's already here.
@Anika_Moa You've no idea how relieved I am to hear Songs for Bubbas 2 is on the way. If I have to sing Tahi Rua Toru once more, Wha...
@TaliaShadwell It must be hard without answers, tho no motive would really make it any less senseless.
Great read @TaliaShadwell, bloody awful for the Stevens family. https://t.co/o0HYcR8nlj
Have only just realised that all these bath salts stories were not actually about bath salts. I'm getting old.
This story perfectly illustrates why we need to double the funding as well as #doublethequota #refugeeswelcome https://t.co/bO6nzAs4e9
@EmmaMakes the barista told me it was coz they make coffee to taste good in their disposable cups. Pfft. #coffeesnobs
@EmmaMakes That is not a cup I am keeping, despite its eco-goodness! I am on a journey, and have not come that far.
Stink, my KeepCup just got rejected at Fuel!? Boo!
When the bus driver notices you waving goodbye to your kid and gives a lil honk for extra thrill :) @metlinkwgtn
Loving @patrickmorgan on The Panel right now, music can be transcendent!
Just made my debut on @SustainTrust's Home Tips series... talking about poo. https://t.co/TP8banmhes
@EmmaMakes It goes both fast and slow, don't it? Hope you're surviving it ok most days.
@EmmaMakes You had a baby! Congrats! If it makes you feel better my bub bit several of my rellies on first meeting 'em ystrdy.Then grinned.
Anyone not yet convinced there is 'real' poverty in NZ should listen to @InsightRNZ right now, heartbreaking stuff on the way families live.
Just used @dompost packaging to wrap freezer portions for my kid, thanks for the inspiration @CalebCarnie https://t.co/I6LyClUw0p
It's a 'dry' topic, I know (pun intended) - but very important we get this right! https://t.co/FJAJNyIAX8
Oh, Bowie, so sad! What a man. https://t.co/Bm7K9FtR16
Beaut photos by Rob Kitchin in today's @DomPost, best vox pop I've seen in ages. https://t.co/b8tRR0sYSL
@GreerBerry Woah, well done Greer and team! Hope the first few days are peaceful. Xx
@radionz Digging your music selection today, thanks for not playing Xmas carols!
Overhead in Wellington: "What's wrong with jandals at work? These are dress-up jandals." #summerfeet
The world has gone fucking mad, these look like the most awkward utensils ever invented. https://t.co/Xtn4wBS6ny
"If we stay here we will surely die." Heartbreaking iv on @NzMorningReport with Syrian doctor. He sounded so weary. https://t.co/E1xD0ZTZkZ
Voted for this beauty in @Forest_and_Bird's Bird of the Year, you should too. https://t.co/lDsOu2DKQa
@DearMama_ What, you're not working on your yummy mummy beach bod yet?
Didn't read the news all day, just caught up - the world is an awful place but no-one cares because rugby.
Beggar to other beggar on Bay Rd: "You got a $1.50 I can borrow?" #kilbirnietweets
Everyone listen to my talented friend @klimtypefoundry talk type on @radionz! He might finally explain what's so wrong with Comic Sans.
@trustpower Our internet has been dropping in and out all wknd, we're in Wgtn - help! Don't make me go outside.
@sinclairrobe Expect a flurry of tweets once every three months. Xx
@michelle_duff I'm getting more and more irritated by the phrase 'took to social media to express their dismay/frustration/shock/horror'.
Dealing with crazy baby hour by taking her pants off and letting her watch The Block. #parentinghacks
@irihapeta Aw, poor kid. I reckon he's a clever dad for tricking so masterfully though!
@irihapeta Heh, that's awesome, I'm using that.
Revelling in my kid's ignorance of technology. I can put on @Anika_Moa and mumble along and she think it's me with the beautiful voice. Hah!
What kind of sicko neighbour has a wind chime in windy WELLINGTON?! #whywellingtonwhy
Relieved to see I am not the only one wearing my slippers at the fish n chip store. #SaturdayNight
When coffee at Junglerama - in the school holidays - is your best offer for the day. #mumlife
Well put @keith_ng, you can't expect a grown-up debate without good data to start with: http://t.co/DajqMHEVN0
@HeatherKMcC I know nothing about Pittsburgh - keep posting your stories and I will learn.
@HeatherKMcC Aw, thanks! Yeah, bit of a shock (planned, but life-changing), but slowly getting the hang of it. Helps that she's adorable.
@HeatherKMcC I don't know how we got ourselves into such a pickle. Are you based in Pennsylvania now?
@jo_moir Believe me, I'll be composing ranty comments for Stuff in no time.
@HeatherKMcC $50k for a house, bargain!
@jo_moir Yeah, I know you're right - four months out of the newsroom and I'm already one of the jerks saying 'is this news?!'. Soz.
@jo_moir I'm easily irritated by these stories, to me it's a no-brainer and shouldn't be news. But I know others might not see it that way.
@jo_moir I'm sure they know that adults are doing it for fun so why not talk realities instead of letting internet misinform them?
@jo_moir Why not? If kids know it's meant to feel good they're more likely to say no when it's uncomfortable or non-consensual.
Zippers, eh? What a hassle. (#firstdayoutofmaternityjeans)
Dear websites aimed at mums but that don't work proper on phones - get yr shit together, I am marooned on the couch shopping with thumbs.
You know you've made a successful transition to parenthood when you get your baby's poo on your top and you don't even bother to change it.
@amyjackman Thanks mate, hope the new job is going well!
@amyjackman Heya, do you know if there's a Givealittle for the Palani family? http://t.co/y9eqfLjAIa
@jo_moir Better be a page two lead Moir! I will very soon be flaky Mum friend, so it'll all work out. X
Look up, look up from your phones! Nice comic from @XTOTL: http://t.co/46rGr50PZa
Peter Jackson's farts ruled out as source of mystery explosion in Eastern Suburbs: http://t.co/gmrVxYnOVA
@sez_sez Only if it put them in a higher tax bracket though right? How many people would that apply to vs who never apply for refunds?
@sez_sez Fair call - it probably works for some and not for others.
@sez_sez As it would most likely hit people on lower incomes forced to work 2 jobs to keep up I'd still prefer to see it scrapped.
@sez_sez I see. Seems to rely on ppl have a good understanding of a fairly complex system and doing the paperwork though.
@sez_sez Does the refund happen automatically or do you have to apply for it?
@sez_sez So you only end up paying more if the second job nudges you into a higher tax bracket?
Reckon they should just scrap secondary tax altogether - seems a mean-spirited policy with little justification. http://t.co/3CjjbRsDO3
I feel like NZME. didn't think through the full stop at the end of their logo, it always looks like a mistake... http://t.co/Jw2hYXffzM
JOY. TO. MY. HEART. Dancing Dad: http://t.co/SthrF3QSs9
Completely entranced by this David Bowie through the year GIF: http://t.co/U1QwBmJgUx
